quest.name: Oddness in the End
journal: Neillemard has both the will and a way to make your Skysteel tool the best it can be.

Neillemard reveals to you that, after much study and scrutiny, he has at last struck upon a means to bring the final set of plans for your Skysteel tool to life. Said means is currently housed at the Skysteel workshop in the Firmament, however, so you will need to venture there and witness it for yourself if you are to understand without enduring a moon's worth of engineering talk.

At the workshop, you find none other than Stephanivien, master of the Skysteel Manufactory. He is accompanied by an ambulatory piece of machina recovered from Azys Lla that, as it transpires, is the key to performing the delicate operations necessary to realize the latest and greatest Skysteel design. Though Neillemard and Nimie will not be available to assist this time around, they seem confident that between this mechanical marvel and the skills of workshop engineers Joellie and Emeny, the fruits of your labors will be fully worth the effort.
objectives: Speak with Emeny at the Skysteel workshop.

dialogue.name: NEILLEMARD
dialogue.text: Just the womanman I was hoping to see! Tell me─how does your skysung tool fare? Is it looking well loved? And more importantly, well tested?

dialogue.name: NEILLEMARD
dialogue.text: Splendid, splendid! We shall examine those wear patterns and make the necessary adjustments to ensure that your perfected tool is as perfect as can be.

dialogue.name: NEILLEMARD
dialogue.text: Yes, you heard me correctly─we are, at long last, prepared to bring the Skysteel tools project to completion.

dialogue.name: NEILLEMARD
dialogue.text: I will admit I felt some consternation when first I realized that our vision for the final design required finesse beyond that of mortal fingers. But what sort of engineer would I be if I could find no way to surpass the limitations that would shackle mankind?

dialogue.name: NEILLEMARD
dialogue.text: No true engineer at all, I say! And so, though I knew that even goblincraft could offer no solutions to our latest conundrum, I nevertheless confided in Rowena. She provided a most tantalizing lead indeed─and through its pursuit, we have at last found the path to the Skysteel summit!

dialogue.name: NIMIE
dialogue.text: While I'm sure Neillemard would like nothing more than to expound upon its wonders in detail, it'd be faster to show you the miracle device in question. A certain someone's pretty attached to it, so you'll need to meet us at the Skysteel workshop in the Firmament.

dialogue.name: NEILLEMARD
dialogue.text: Quite right. Ask for Emeny when you arrive─she has newly joined the project and is ever so eager to make herself useful. Nimie and I have a few spare parts we've been meaning to round up for delivery to the workshop, but we will join you soon enough.

dialogue.name: NEILLEMARD
dialogue.text: It truly is the most ingenious thing! Why, the manner in which it─ah, but why take my word for it? Make for the workshop posthaste and witness its wonders for yourself!

dialogue.name: JOELLIE
dialogue.text: If you wish to inquire about enhancements to your Skysteel tool, please speak with Emeny here. I am sure you will find her quite...eager.

dialogue.name: EMENY
dialogue.text: <gasp> I've seen you with Neillemard at the manufactory! That means you are the one that he recruited to help refine the Skysteel tools, are you not?

dialogue.name: EMENY
dialogue.text: <gasp> I can hardly believe it! Can you believe it, Joellie!?

dialogue.name: JOELLIE
dialogue.text: For heavens' sake, Emeny, you look like a jumping balloonfish! ...Apologies, ma'amsir. Her professional enthusiasm at times gets the better of her. As for your tool, we'd be more than happy to help just as soon as our means of doing so has been properly oiled up.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: (-???-)Never fear, my dear, for the tedium of maintenance is at an end!

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: It is delightful to see you again, Forename. Do allow me to introduce Steelvien “Spanner” de Haillenarte I, Esquire─a technological marvel!

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Pray allow me to introduce myself─Stephanivien de Haillenarte, at your service. And you must be the tradeswomanman about whom I have heard so much. I present to you Steelvien “Spanner” de Haillenarte I, Esquire─may he serve you well.

dialogue.name: NEILLEMARD
dialogue.text: Spanner, I am happy to say, is the solution to the conundrum I mentioned before. He performs mechanical manipulations with unparalleled precision and finesse.

dialogue.name: NEILLEMARD
dialogue.text: We salvaged him from Azys Lla, you see─a locale I was unaware even existed until Rowena told me of it.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Aurvael was kind enough to fly us there. Almost getting devoured by ravening beasts was less than ideal, but well worth the trouble for such a bounty of fascinating technology! My prospectometer could hardly keep up.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: When we came upon Steelvien “Spanner” de Haillenarte I, Esquire, I knew immediately what I had to do. Thus did I stealthily conceal him amongst my personal effects for the return journey, with no one else the wiser.

dialogue.name: NEILLEMARD
dialogue.text: ...Indeed. We also located a number of other parts that should prove useful to our endeavors, if the records stored within Spanner's circuitry are accurate.

dialogue.name: NEILLEMARD
dialogue.text: Some are to be found in Azys Lla, of course, but it appears that a foray to the Diadem would also prove fruitful.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Should you have any doubt as to the materials, Steelvien “Spanner” de Haillenarte I, Esquire will be more than happy to elaborate, I'm sure. I myself may not be here to guide you every step of the way, but never fear─I have given Joellie comprehensive instruction in his operation.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: The talents of the rest of our staff are at your disposal as well, naturally, as is our conveniently located workshop here. Needless to say, we're all eager to see what comes of the ultimate phase of innovation!

dialogue.name: NEILLEMARD
dialogue.text: We believe you'll find the workshop undeniably well suited to this end. It offers convenient access to the Diadem, and all of the latest manufacturing technology.

dialogue.name: NEILLEMARD
dialogue.text: Alas, this does mean that Nimie and I will be unable to assist as you prepare to bring the final design to life. Rowena has been flooding us with orders of late, and we simply cannot afford to be away from the manufactory for long.

dialogue.name: NIMIE
dialogue.text: It pains me both personally and professionally to say so, but Neillemard's right. While I'd much rather spend my time pursuing our next major breakthrough, a deal's a deal.

dialogue.name: NEILLEMARD
dialogue.text: Nevertheless, we have complete faith in Joellie and Emeny─and Spanner, I suppose─to help take your Skysteel tool to the very pinnacle of possibility.

dialogue.name: EMENY
dialogue.text: I absolutely, positively, indubitably, unquestionably will not let you down!

dialogue.name: JOELLIE
dialogue.text: Appearances perhaps to the contrary, we are in fact experienced engineers. You and your tool are in good─if excitable─hands.

dialogue.name: JOELLIE
dialogue.text: That said, we only have the resources to help you with upgrading skysung tools. If you have any tools that aren't to that level yet, you'll have to ask Nimie. Those plans are all at the manufactory.

dialogue.name: EMENY
dialogue.text: Upgrading your skysung tool is what we're all here for, though, isn't it? So let's get right to it!
